page.title: 14Employment
page.content: The majority of workers from the area are employed in the Elgin area. The main occupations in the area are farming and forestry work. Farming however is no longer labour intensive and employs few.The area is densely wooded and many men are employed by the Forestry Commission with their headquarters at Mosstodloch. The Salmon Fishing on the Spey provides a steady source of employment for{GILLIES}who assist the wealthy anglers in the season and for the rest of the year look after the river,protecting the fish from poachers and also making sure of future supplies by stocking pools with eggs or young fish. {BAXTERS}the food processing firm and {CHRISTIES}with their supply of trees also provide much employment.
